name: pm-global-header
description: Application's global header which header, navigation bar and connect bar

scripts.start: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel --watch src --out-dir dist --copy-files
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files
scripts.autolink:webstaking: npm link && cd ../pm-webstaking && npm link pm-global-header
scripts.autolink:webtrader: npm link && cd ../pm-webtrader && npm link pm-global-header

author: Phobosys
